Articles.Content:
A new part of the Space Center where your deceased Kerbals go to rest. When one dies you enter the memorial site and you can put a message on his grave stone in the middle between the name and date, maybe even select the gravestone model. and in the center you can have a large flag.

And maybe you could get it to play this music when in the memorial area -
aw damn didnt realize i couldnt suggest this
Yup, this is on the not-to-suggest list. Closing thread now.
